getCommunicator

public OldCommunicator getCommunicator()

setCommunicator

void setCommunicator(OldCommunicator communicator)

isOnline

protected boolean isOnline()
returns true if the user currently has an active connection to the server. when the user unplugs their internet cord, this will change to false. when the user plugs their internet cord back in, this will change to true after about 15 seconds.

Returns:

receiveMessage

                                    String message)
receives a message from another user that uses this workspace.

sendMessage

protected void sendMessage(String to,
                           String message)
sends a message. on the recipient's computer, receiveMessage will be called.

receiveMessage0

void receiveMessage0(String from,
                     String message)

broadcastMessage

protected void broadcastMessage(String message)
same as sendMessage, but it sends it to all online users. Currently, this just calls sendMessage() for every member of getOnlineUsers(), so it offers no additional data transfer efficiency benefits. in the future, it will actually call a different server command so that the message is only sent once to the server.

Parameters:
message -

userStatusChanged

public abstract void userStatusChanged()
indicates that a user has signed on or off. since features don't have a specific list of users assigned to them, this method is called when any known user signs on or off. a known user is a user used in some part of the system. currently, this is the local user's contacts and any users in the local user's workspaces.

getUsername

protected String getUsername()
returns this user's username.

Returns:

listUsers

protected String[] listUsers()
lists all users signed up for OpenGroove. this list could be potentially large, so this method should not be called frequently.

Returns:

listOnlineUsers

protected String[] listOnlineUsers()
lists all users who are online.

Returns:

listOfflineUsers

protected String[] listOfflineUsers()
lists all users who are offline.

Returns:

getStorageFile

protected File getStorageFile()
returns the folder that the Feature can use for local storage.

Note: Even if the feature is uninstalled and then reinstalled, this folder will still have the same contents. It is therefore important to include some sort of option in the UI that allows the user to clear all data associated with this Feature.

Returns:

initialize

public abstract void initialize()
initializes this workspace. this is called for each workspace that the user is a member of when the user runs OpenGroove. if this method throws an exception, the exception will be printed to stderr, but the workspace will continue to be used.

getRegisteredType

protected final String getRegisteredType()
gets the registered type of the workspace. this is usually specified in the workspace plugin descriptor, so it is usually known anyway.

Returns:

Properties getPluginMetadata()
